articles.description: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah fame Gurucharan Singh has returned home after going missing on April 22. In an exclusive chat with Times Now/ Telly Talk India, TMKOC producer Asit Kumarr Modi expresses his happiness at the news
